content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Download this collection of unique rhythm games on PS4® from Sony’s Santa Monica Studio.

Hohokum
Enter the whimsical, colorful universe of Hohokum, a distinct creative collaboration between artist Richard Hogg and Honeyslug. Take on the role of a curious flying kite-like being and travel to colorful worlds waiting to be discovered. Interact with characters and environments to uncover secrets or simply roam at your own pace and be amused at the surprises that unfold. At its heart Hohokum is a playground - a place to wander about and get lost in.

Sound Shapes
Part platformer, part music creator, Sound Shapes combines sight and sound into a unique gaming experience. Play through albums by Beck, deadmau5, and Jim Guthrie and illustrated by artists from Capy (SUPER TIME FORCE), Pyramid Attack (Jabbawaki, Guitar Hero), and Superbrothers (Sword & Sorcery). Alongside the Campaign, jump into thousands of Community-created levels and the Level Editor for practically infinite replay value.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

©2014 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Hohokum is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Sound Shapes is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
attributes.name: The Rhythmic Bundle
